title: My Conversations with the Devil: Introducing Damon Black
description: How can one define evil? Even Hitler had his fans. What if the most diabolical individual began healing the sick, and feeding the hungry? Would you follow him? Should you follow him?When a magazine writer named Peter Grant is given a once in a lifetime opportunity to be the sole person with access to the most electrifying entertainer on the planet named Damon Black, he may have redefine his definition of evil. Who is Damon Black and why is this "man" so interested in Peter Grant?
author: Stewart C. Alastair
